title: [Linux] Project Zomboid Build 27
description:
Compressed with lzma2 (7zip) for maximum compression to save bandwidth and time.

Uncompressed Size: 1.2 GB (1,228,716,308 bytes)
Compressed Size:   271 MB (285,193,321 bytes)

You will, most likely, need 7zip to extract the game. It's free, and the best compression tool out there.  <a href="
http://www.7-zip.org/" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.7-zip.org/</a>

Update log: http://theindiestone.com/forums/index.php/topic/8467-released-build-27/

=========================
     Instructions
=========================
Assuming you're running Ubuntu
1. sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install p7zip-full
2. Navigate to where you downloaded the file
3. 7z x 'ProjectZomboid Build27.7z' -o <path>
   OR
   7z e 'ProjectZomboid Build27.7z'
4. Navigate to the extracted folder
5. sudo chmod -R +rx .

Basically, you need to unzip the file and give the extracted contents executable permissions.
